MUSIC VIDEOS
Hallelujah Money

Release date: 19th January 2017

This video marked the first new Gorillaz song in five years, originally being stated as a standalone non-single release; and not part of Humanz (this was a lie).

Saturnz Barz (Spirit House)

Standard version

Release date: 23rd March 2017

This was the final time Nelson De Freitas voiced 2D.

LIVE VISUALS

Most of the Humanz visuals have two versions, either with or without the collaborators. Several older visuals and music videos were also given glitch effects during this phase.

MISC. WORKS
Murdoc BRIT Awards Acceptance Speech
The Late Show Presents: Bonus Tracks, Gorillaz Edition

This The Late Show special features Damon & various collaborators discussing the making of Humanz; along with some live performances.

Motion-Capture Videos

This interview marked the first time Kevin Bishop voiced 2D; along with being the first ever on-screen live interview with the band members.

Much like Phase 2’s puppets, Phase 4 would create motion-capture models of Murdoc & 2D; using them in various promotional videos and interviews to reduce the amount of money spent on animation.
